cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7779, DHS Restrictions on Confucius Institutes and Chinese Entities of Concern Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 83 (Monday, May 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PFLUGER:
H.R. 7779.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article l, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United Sates
Constitution
[Page H5009]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 351.
